# Gemma Terms of Use

Last modified: March 24, 2025

Thank you for using Gemma! These terms of use ("Agreement") govern your use of Gemma.
By using Gemma, you agree to all applicable terms of this Agreement. If you do not
agree to this Agreement, you are not authorized to use Gemma.

## Section 1: DEFINITIONS

### 1.1 Definitions.
(a) "Gemma" means the machine learning model, software components, algorithms, and
    user interface elements, and any updates, provided to you at ai.google.dev/gemma.
(b) "Model Derivatives" means any modifications to Gemma, works based on Gemma, or
    any other machine learning models or components that are created or adapted
    based on Gemma.
(c) "Use Restrictions" means the prohibitions and rules set forth in the Prohibited
    Use Policy.
(d) "Generated Output" means the information, data, content, or other output
    generated by Gemma or Model Derivatives.
(e) "Distribute" means to transfer, transmit, or otherwise make available Gemma or
    the Model Derivatives, in whole or in part, to a third party.
(f) "Hosted Service" means a hosted or managed service that allows a third party to
    access and use Gemma or Model Derivatives through your infrastructure, including
    through an API, web interface, or other remote access methods.
(g) "Google" means Google LLC.
(h) "Prohibited Use Policy" means the policy found at
    ai.google.dev/gemma/prohibited_use_policy.

### 1.2
As used in this Agreement, "including" means "including without limitation".

## Section 2: ELIGIBILITY AND USAGE

### 2.1 Eligibility.
You must be of legal age to enter into a binding agreement in your country of
residence to use Gemma. If you do not have legal capacity to enter into an
agreement, you may not use Gemma unless you have consent from your parent or legal
guardian.

### 2.2 Use.
You may use Gemma only in accordance with this Agreement. You will comply with any
applicable policies, and all applicable laws and regulations when using Gemma. Google
will not be responsible for any consequences resulting from your use of Gemma. You may
not use Gemma to develop models that compete with Gemma or other Google models.

## Section 3: DISTRIBUTION AND RESTRICTIONS

### 3.1 Distribution and Redistribution.
You may reproduce or Distribute Gemma or Model Derivatives, but only if you comply
with the following conditions:
1. If you Distribute Gemma or Model Derivatives, you must include the Use Restrictions
   referenced in Section 3.2 as an enforceable provision in any agreement (including
   your Terms of Service or Terms of Use) governing the use or distribution of Gemma
   or Model Derivatives.
2. If you Distribute Gemma or Model Derivatives, you must provide a copy of this
   Agreement to the recipients.
3. If you Distribute Gemma or Model Derivatives, you must cause any modified files
   to carry prominent notices stating that you modified the files.
4. All Distributions of Gemma or Model Derivatives (other than through a Hosted
   Service) must be accompanied by a "Notice" text file that contains the following
   notice: "Gemma is provided under and subject to the Gemma Terms of Use found at
   ai.google.dev/gemma/terms".

You may add your own copyright statement to your modifications. Additional terms may
not conflict with the terms of this Agreement.

### 3.2 Use Restrictions.
The Use Restrictions in the Prohibited Use Policy govern your use of Gemma, Model
Derivatives and Generated Output.

### 3.3 Generated Output.
You acknowledge that Generated Output may be inaccurate, contain biases, or otherwise
not be suitable for all purposes. You are responsible for evaluating the accuracy and
appropriateness of Generated Output for your use case.

## Section 4: ADDITIONAL PROVISIONS

### 4.1 Updates.
Google may update Gemma or this Agreement from time to time. If you do not want to
receive or use any updates, you may stop using Gemma.

### 4.2 Trademarks.
Nothing in this Agreement grants you the right to use any trademarks or branding of
Google or its affiliates.

### 4.3 DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTY.
GEMMA IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT ANY WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING
WITHOUT LIMITATION, IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR
PURPOSE, TITLE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT.

### 4.4 LIMITATION OF LIABILITY.
GEMMA IS PROVIDED "AS-IS" AND WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY. TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY
LAW, YOU AGREE THAT GOOGLE WILL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGES, INCLUDING DIRECT,
INDIRECT, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, INCIDENTAL, OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES, ARISING OUT OF OR
IN ANY WAY RELATING TO THIS AGREEMENT OR YOUR USE OF GEMMA.

### 4.5 Term, Termination, and Survival.
This Agreement will remain in effect until terminated. Google may terminate this
Agreement if you breach it. Upon termination, you must stop using Gemma. Sections 2.2,
3, and 4 survive termination.

### 4.6 Governing Law and Jurisdiction.
This Agreement is governed by the laws of the State of California, excluding its
conflict of laws rules. Any dispute arising out of this Agreement will be resolved in
the courts of Santa Clara County, California.

### 4.7 Severability.
If any provision of this Agreement is found to be unenforceable, the remaining
provisions will remain in full effect.

### 4.8 Entire Agreement.
This Agreement is the entire agreement between you and Google relating to Gemma. It
supersedes any prior agreements. This Agreement does not create any third party
beneficiary rights.

### 4.9 No Waiver.
A failure to enforce any provision of this Agreement will not constitute a waiver.

## Appendix

### Gemma Models (as of Jan 28, 2025)
- Gemma 1: Gemma 2b, Gemma 7b
- Gemma 2: Gemma 2 2b, Gemma 2 9b, Gemma 2 27b
- Gemma 3: Gemma 3 1b, Gemma 3 4b, Gemma 3 12b, Gemma 3 27b
- Gemma 3n: Gemma 3n e2b, Gemma 3n e4b
